评论详情: Bought for my daughter and she loved them.

The price sold me over all. I have high arches and have been hesitant to try barefoot shoes. With this reasonable price we finally decided to try! Now my husband and all three of my kids have pair too!  Lightweight! Glide on easy, feel secure! No more knee, lower back, or foot pain!

Can't get over how comfy these are. I went with my normal size, and they fit great. There is just enough padding to feel soft while also being a barefoot shoe. There is also extra padding near your heel which I think helps the comfort even more.  Can't speak on durability as I've only had them a week or so, but have worn them to work, the gym, and out and about, and they were great in both environments. I don't imagine I'll run into issues with durability, but considering the cost, you can't beat it. I've bought shoes for $$$ that lasted only a month or 2. These are already exceeding my expectations.  Have already started looking into other designs by this company to slowly replace my shoe collection with this brand.

I bought these when I started a new job, as I had finally converted to the dark side (the barefoot dark side, that is). Now, I do own some leather vivo barefoots, but I didn't want to bring in my nice shoes to work. These were on sale, so I purchased them, and they were actually quite nice! They were not as wide as I would have liked, as I do have very wide feet and wearing these actually caused a bit of callousing to develop on the medial aspect of my big toe, but other than that I found these shoes to be very comfortable. If you are NOT used to wearing barefoot shoes, it is a big difference. Your foot will probably be uncomfortable at first. The more you wear them, and the stronger your foot muscles and structures become, they get more comfortable. I just wish they were wider at the toe box. But not a bad deal.
Love the look. Probably should have bought regular instead of wide, but still like the shoe.
The shoes fit great but a little tight around ankle but fit good
These shoes are excellent for someone with wide feet and bunions.  Slip on and off.  I’ve been having them for about 6 months and still look new.

I bought these a little over a year ago.  I've suffered with plantar fascia for 4 years now.  I've tried all the doctor recommended shoes for it but I'll say going against the recommended shoes and choosing these was the absolute best decision I've made for my feet.  I am so very pleased with the results.  My feet feel so good when I wear these.  I also get lots of compliments.  I'm about to order a new pair.  I have the dark grey ones now but I'd like the lighter color for summer.
Bought these for running--love the price. They feel great, very roomy in the toebox.
This is my 3rd style and they are very comfortable. True to size. Buying another color

评论概述: My feet are in love with these shoes!
评论详情: And so am I! They look great and very different from the white pair I bought shortly before I bought the pink ones. I love the soft pink color. The toe box is bigger, making them eminently more comfortable than the white ones I have.

I have wide feet and these are comfortable for me. I wear with the thinnest socks that are footies  (no-show) and it works well for me.  I would buy a size larger next time to use arch inserts and give me a bit more room, I normally wear a 9.5 XW.

I feel these shoes run a tad small but I stuck with my original size and will be keeping them. I find them incredibly comfortable and really easy to get on and off. The material is nice-not too thick but not thin and flimsy. For a wide toe shoe, the design is cute enough. It’s a change in mindset that is for sure. It’s a different style than your other type of shoe. I am happy i bought them and plan to get a white pair too.

I wanted to get some flat footed sneakers with the wide toe box for lifting. For the price they are decent quality and really comfortable. I've been using them almost daily for over a month and no complaints!
These shoes are so comfortable. I love the wide toe base. They are lightweight and the quality feels great.  They even look cute. I will be buying more colors for sure!

I use some of this brands shoes so I’m not trying to be a full on hater, but this style has got to be the ugliest style I’ve ever worn. Comfy!! But I was actually bullied by 6 different people when I was out in public wearing them.

评论概述: Love them but quality assurance lacking
评论详情: I bought these shoes for my daily walk. I do walk several miles and understand that is more than typical wear. I bought my first pair and loved them but live in a very wet and rainy area and needed another pair to wear when the other is still drying out. I got my second pair and there were no real issues at first. About a month into using the second pair the sole insert (that is not supposed to be detachable) started to slip backwards during my walk until it was 1/3 of the way down the shoe. I can reposition it to the correct spot but within a block it’s slipped again. Once this started occurring I was already outside of the return timeframe. So I guess I have mixed feelings, my first pair have been awesome but the second pair have been subpar.

I was having joint pain in my toes and once I switched to these shoes the pain is gone! I love them, they’re very breathable so they’ve never gotten smelly. They’re stretchy and very comfortable. The only downside is now I can’t wear any other shoes cause these make them all seem so uncomfortable!! haha

评论概述: Very good shoes for the price
评论详情: These shoes met my expectations. I bought them for gym and they're very comfortable.

I bought these out of desperation when I read online that they could help with hip pain.  I'd been having hip pain for months and the doctors just kept saying wait and rest...I could barely walk around the block!  I've been wearing Hokas for years...the exact opposite of these shoes.  But I decided to try.  What a difference!  I can walk for hours in these shoes...no hip pain. And when they get dirty (they are white), I just throw them in the washing machine and let them air dry. They are the closest thing to going barefoot.  They basically just protect the bottom of your foot from cuts and scrapes. It feels like you are walking on a little foam cusion, but you can feel the ground beneath your feet.  I wish they came in more styles and colors, mostly I wish they made laceless ones. This is the only shoe I wear now for walks, gym, working out, anything.
No half sizes in the middle range earns these shoes a zero star rating.

Not sure if anyone else has the issue of these being extremely slippery in any type of wet climate or environment. They're very comfortable, wide toe, and easy to slip on and off but they have absolutely no traction at all.

评论概述: Not a good shoe for mature/physically challenged
评论详情: Feel pretty good, very difficult to put on because the tongue is connected
Very nice wide toe box!  Finally I'm able to get a shoe that isn't too long, trying to make up for it being too narrow.  Comfortable wide shoe for a very reasonable price.  Soft sole and lightweight.
loved it, but was just too small. ordered a different pair in half size bigger
These shoes are nice and wide however they don’t offer much arch support.
I have Morton's neuroma and usually wear crocs. When I volunteered at a local theatre and found out I needed black , closed toe shoes I panicked. I bought these and my feet are happy.

评论概述: Promising - but ultimately not for me :(
评论详情: I purchased these shoes for weight lifting. I wanted something that was flat (zero-ish drop), not too cushy, and has plenty of room in the toebox.  They are shipped in a shrink-wrapped plastic bag. At first, I was like 🤔, but actually this is a good idea - less weight, less waste.  When I first opened them up, my first reaction was CLOWN SHOWS! 🤡 The toe boxes are big, and they look kinda goofy. But once I put them on, they really don't look silly at all - simple and sleek.  The quality is surprisingly good. The materials seem as durable as you'd expect for a pair of cheap shoes in this range, and all of the stitching seemed pretty good too.  The dealbreaker is the design. The pleather lacing side straps are pretty stiff. When I bend my foot deeply, the top of it digs right into the crease of my big toe. I already hate lunges enough, I don't need to be saying "ouch" because my back foot is being pinched every time I lunge!! It's possible this might soften up over time, but I could tell from wearing these for 2 minutes that it wouldn't happen before I got a big blister. So, back they go, and the search continues.
Comfortable, supportive fit and great looking. Perfect for gym, walking or just looking good
I absolutely love these shoes for weight training. They are comfortable, they are super wide in the toe box area. It’s a game changer in my workout! I’m usually a 7 1/2 or 8  and I got the 8.

These are the best most comfortable shoes! Fits perfectly not too wide, not too much of an arch, just enough. Doesn’t hurt even wearing the first time. Love love love. I wore them two days in a row no feet pain!
I added a cheap insole and it made these a great deal for the price. I was dealing with plantar fasciitis and the wide toe box really helped. Recommend!

These are awesome! I have been cursed with “Fred Flinstone” feet that are really wide. The outside toe and edge of my foot usually spill over regularly width shoes. These are awesome though with plenty of room for my wide feet heel to toe. Because they’re wider than normal shoes, you might consider sizing down if you’re between sizes because I ordered the size that I usually wear and there is room for my foot to move around.

评论概述: The only show I will buy
评论详情: I tried Xero shoes multiple times and they always ripped apart at the seams within 2 months. I bought a pair of these shoes over a year ago and they still look like new. I work 13 hour shifts and my feet never hurt. They are the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn, and they look so good! I will never buy another shoe that is not a whitin as long as they are in existence. My toes have so much room, the shoes are flexible and light weight.

评论概述: Really Wide with Uncomfortable Upper Layer
评论详情: I really wanted to like these shoes. They were recommended for weight training because they are zero drop and have a wide toe box. But wide toe box made the shoes look really fat and a little odd. The main shoe material was fine but the upper layer that you thread the laces through was really stiff, almost like plastic. These would probably work if you need wide shoes, but I wouldn’t recommend them for working out or walking.
I was told they worked nicely, was a gift ,  so can’t really tell about comport. We did have to return them because of size. Was sent a men’s 8 instead of woman’s 8
Fit well, look Great

These came highly recommended and they are perfect for walking and everyday activities. I preferred the gum bottom but you can get them with the matching white bottom. I got mine during cyber Monday at a steal but they are worth the price.

评论概述: I’m going to buy another pair
评论详情: I love these. My feet haven’t bothered me at all since I started wearing them. I will be ordering a second pair.
Very rich color, comfortable fabric and quality even better than pictured. Love the pool tab on the back with the stripe it is a nice touch
They’re to uncomfortable to be worth being so silly
These shoes are like walking barefoot. No toes pinching. Feel so good I bought 3 pair.

While I love the ease in which it lets me walk and let's me spread my toes, I'm not a fan of the plastic part. I have a very small bunion and the plastic edge kinda hurts. If you have nonbunionated feet even in the slightest sense, then these might be for you.

评论概述: My favorite pair of WHITIN shoes!!!
评论详情: I find these shoes to be the most confortable zero drop shoes I've ever had. Great for walking, running, and strength workouts!!

评论概述: I wear these every day for work!
评论详情: These are the best shoes I have had, I got them because I wanted the barefoot style to allow my toes to splay without a huge arch. Fit true to size, comfortable, breathable, and washable. I have washed them about 5 times in almost 2 years, I surprisingly get so many compliments on them. The rubber is finally starting to come away from the fabric on the side where the toes bend but definitely to be expected with their level of use! Highly highly recommended alternative to the higher priced brands!

评论概述: Fit well, just not great construction.
评论详情: Seemed flimsy and would not hold up for too long. REgretfully returned them.
Not a good shoe for support. My feet were slipping around and wasn’t able to return do to fit.

评论概述: Never going back to traditional workout shoes
评论详情: I love these shoes. I have repurchased them because I wear them so much, I have worn out the tread on the bottoms. I walk a lot and I walk on an indoor treadmill at home, so I have separate indoor and outdoor pairs. These are also great for weight lifting in the gym. I had a lot of foot, knee and hip pain when walking with traditional running shoes before I bought these and after a month of wearing these zero drop shoes it got so much better. I think I bought my first couple pairs a little over a year ago and at this time I have no pain or issues when walking or working out.
I love these! Its my second time purchasing this pair. I'm on my feet all day at work and they don't hurt my feet at all. Super comfortable.

评论概述: lol not sure why I wait to buy anymore
评论详情: I waited for Black Friday .. hoping these specific shoes would have a decent sale (about 3 month) and to buy for my children.. when I look 3 months ago these were listed 41.99 .. sometimes certain styles would have a percentage discount but yea .. they say 37.99 as a sale today, but the original a says it was 59.99 .. total lie .. but I told myself okay it’s still less than 37.99 BUT BUT the percentage discount will normally be about 10 percent.. so realistically waiting saved me next to nothing.. I did develop better patience with myself lol .. and I liked my first two pair so I bought more styles .. BUT I COULD HAVE BEEN MADE THE PURCHASE.. why do companies need a hefty report of merchandise moved in November is what I want to know .. I’ll look that up .. what’s so important about November.. or end of year spike in sales in general.. November and December.. use to only be December but November was added .. I’ll look that up .. oh but the shoes .. nothing fancy .. moderate quality sewing .. if you short on funds but want to start the barefoot shoes get these .. they are comfortable.. the 10.5 were better for my normally size 11 feet .. I bought an 11 in a different style it was to big .. but I kept them lol .. good shoe but a bit stif But buy anytime price is the same year around

I really wanted to like these but boy they sent the wrong size. I'm a size 8 wide which is the 39 in European sizes they sent me a 43. They came in just a plain plastic bag with a barcode on them and a little sticker on each one that said it's a 43. They seem to have a nice amount of cushion just a little bit just enough and they look like they would have had plenty of room if they were in my size but now I don't know if I'm going to get another pair. I needed them for this weekend it's a little late for that now. It's not that difficult to read a number

评论概述: Less adjustment time than I expected!
评论详情: I have been wanting to try zero line shoes for a while, and was ready to wear them only a few hrs at a time, until I hopefully built up a tolerance.  Well i came here today to get a second pair,  because i like to rotate my shoes, and these have become so comfortable that I dont want to wear my other "tennis shoes" unless I have to.  I've been wearing them daily for about three days.I wasn't sure I would want to feel barefooted this much, but it is maybe BETTER than barefoot because the soles of my feet feel completely protected from the elements,  and the gum rubber sole gives me a nice bounce when I walk. Watch out world!

I bought these prior to a beach vacation. I have kidney failure and that causes leg swelling. The opening of these shoes are small, but with my husband's help, I can get my feet in them. If I am too swollen, they can feel too tight and hurt to wear. I removed the laces. The shoes are pretty elastic, so they fit like a glove and my foot doesn't slosh around. True to my fit. They are very comfortable. The back has a cushion to protect the back heel. I will buy these again in the future.

Very comfortable and perfect for weight lifting (i.e. very flat and no cushion). The toe area is a little wide which looks odd but nothing that affects the shoe itself. They seem pretty stain resistant too. I’ve worn them about 5 times to my CrossFit gym and see very little stains, even after laying on the floor. Burpees also seem to stain white shoes but these are holding strong. Definitely worth the price
Love them! So comfy. I wanted to find similar to Vivos at a more affordable price and these are it! May be getting more colors!
Wide toe box for bunioned flat (no arch) feet I inherited my mom’s feet instead of her curly hair. Its nice to finally realize affordable stylish footwear

评论概述: I gave these a couple weeks of walking before a review.
评论详情: I have bunions, and could not find wide enough walking shoes. These are great for that. My feet don't hurt after walking! I do feel like that they cause you to use different muscles that regular shoes do not make you use, but thats a good thing. I also was concerned there may not be enough padding for me, at my age, but like I said, my feet do not hurt afterwards! I will have to see how ling they hold up, not wore in wet weather, but seem to be made well. Delivered quickly!
They are not as comfortable as I expected. Cute though.
Everyone needs these

评论概述: Best wide toe box shoes - better than the more expensive brands
评论详情: I have tried a couple of the the more expensive barefoot wide tow box brands - and these are comparable and even better than some. This is my second pair. And the style is great, you don’t look like a clown. This is my go to brand from now on.
Completely flat and the grip is reliable. I use 5 days out of the week for strength training.

Okay first off, in this picture I was intentionally trying to look creepy, please don't judge me LOL. Seen here are definitely this pair of shoes though. Honest review incoming! :3  I'll be real, I don't usually expect much when it comes to a minimalistic shoe! They're hit or miss. But these, these got me through a four hour hike at Enchanted rock. Didn't hurt me at all, the wide toe foot is PERFECT for walking and movement. BUT, I do recommend that you work your way down to these shoes as it can take a while to get used to if you've been using shoes with arch support. These broke in very quickly though, and remained perfectly sturdy after my hike!  The GRIP. These shoes have what I like to call a "monkey grip" LOL but no lie! I was climbing and even crawling in a cave from the confidence the grip on these gave me. I truly am impressed am very, very happy with this purchase. I'll definitely be buying more from this brand. Comfortable, wide toe minimalist shoe for a very good price. I highly recommend them if you're needing a nice new pair of wide toe shoes.
These shoes are comfortable, zero drop, and perfect for a barefoot person like me who has to wear closed toe shoes for work.  If you're between sizes size up.

I debated this purchase for a while. I have very high arches and was concerned about that. They arrived and I’ve worn them non-stop. I do CrossFit in them and the difference lifting in these is amazing. I still prefer my regular tennis shoes for long walks…but I can see eventually wearing these. So so comfortable I will be a forever customer.

This shoe gives really gives my toes room to work for balancing and pushing off.  For me they could have a little more structure and arch support for the mid foot area, but none of my previous shoes have given me as strong of a base.  I'd definitely prefer shoes like this for lifting weights.
I just started using these for lifting weights so I'm not using sneakers. So far, I have had a good experience. They are comfy and serve my purposes. No problems so far

I work in a restaurant and average about 10,000+ steps in 6 hours. I’ve had horrible plantar fasciitis and tried everything, at my doctors recommendation. Nothing labeled “plantar fasciitis relief” has worked for me. The only thing I’ve found that alleviates my foot pain is walking barefoot as often as possible. I decided to try these shoes because, being barefoot most of my time off and having nearly no pain after being barefoot, I wanted a way to alleviate most of my pain during and after my shifts. I have very expensive $140 “cloves” which are meant for healthcare providers and they KILL me. I can barely walk after I wear them.  Let me say, after one shift in these, I have hardly any pain and the slip resistance was exactly the same as any other “slip resistant” shoe, but a fraction of the cost. Seriously I don’t care how many times these shoes fall apart I’ll continue ordering if they continue taking care of my feet the way they did. 10/10 recommend.

These shows are AMAZING! I wasn’t sure if they would be cute, but I think they are. I wore them to a work conference where I walked 5-7miles each day. Not one blister and my feet/heels didn’t hurt at the end of the day!!! Great for the airport too.

I love these shoes. They are very light and comfortable. I like the fact that they have a roomy toe box since I have wide feet. I normally wear a size 8 shoe, so I bought the size 8-8.5 and they seem to be true to size. I've only been wearing them for 3 days, but they get more comfortable every day.

评论概述: Removable sole inside is too small
评论详情: The removable sole inside the shoe is too small so your toes hang over an edge.

评论概述: These are amazing, will be buying more
评论详情: I love these shoes! I went from wearing converse to these and though the difference of shoe type is massive, so is the comfort level. I feel myself choosing these over any other daily shoe I own. They are so roomy for the toes and I love that they are flexible for the arch so my feet are able to move naturally.
Ordered the size 8 and was sent a size 7. They look like nice shoes, but am going to need the right size.

I finally resorted to comfort instead of fashion and my search was rewarded. These are shoes I wore to mow the lawn and complete some fall gardening. They were very comfortable as of I was walking barefoot. I’m going to order another pair immediately.
These shoes are good for the price. Seem to be well made and very comfortable. If you like the barefoot feel they’re great. If you like more support in a shoe then these would not be for you.

I really wanted to love this shoe; however, I did return it.  I'm a fan of minimalist/barefoot shoes. When this arrived, it fit well and was actually cute and stylish. The width was fairly wide and felt good on my toes. What I did NOT like was the high piece of material above the heel. On my foot, that rubbed my heel and was very uncomfortable. Others might find it totally fine and not a nuisance. Regardless, it's a cute and comfortable shoe in every other aspect.

I've been wearing crocs for 3 months straight. I have flat feet. I work in healthcare and food service. So believe me when I tell you it's hard to find shoes that are comfortable. Recently at my food service job Cros were ban because they were "unprofessional". I knew immediately my feet were going to suffer. The first day I wore my old Brooks tennis shoes...I cried. My feet hurt so bad for 3 days straight. My hips hurt and my thighs. I couldn't believe it. My Crocs were saving me from all this pain. For the past week I've been searching for a shoe alternative to my Crocs. I've heard of barefoot shoes but was always afraid to try them because of the price tag and how goofy they look. I saw a review about someone using them as a shoe alternative to Crocs and I was immediately sold. I purchased these after measuring my feet and went with a 9 wide. They fit perfectly and fit even better without the insole...which is removable. I'm super happy because my feet can spread and I know they won't be swollen at the end of the day. I love them so much I immediately purchased a gray pair. I may wear barefoot shoes for the rest of my life. They do take so getting use to. I recommend if you want to try them...ease into them. Wear some Crocs first so you can build up to it...kinda like training wheels. Then switch to barefoot shoes. Alot of people complained about no arch support and no cushion but honestly the shoe is made like that for a reason. I advise anyone to do their research and watch a few YouTube videos before purchasing. I love them!!!
Perfect for lifting! I love the flat bottoms and they are also cute and comfortable

As a Lems and Altra devotee, I was looking for a less expensive alternative and these were not it. The shoes seem to be constructed well, but they literally feel like wearing bedroom slippers and offered about as much support. After an average day at work walking around 4-5k steps, I came home with massive  arch, heel and ankle pain. The shoes are the right size length-wise, but just floppy all around and not functional for a full day. Lot just lack of padding, but lack of stability.

评论概述: Just what I’ve been looking for!
评论详情: I have a medical condition which causes my heat to overheat easily. I tend to be barefoot or where flip flops as much as possible. I saw an advertisement for “barefoot sneakers” and wasn’t fond of the price tag. I looked up similar sneakers on Amazon and found these game changers. I love that they don’t overheat my feet and I can wear them without socks. So comfy and breathable. Just what I needed.
Using zero gravity to relieve back pain
Loving the wide shoes so much I have 3 pairs and my foot pain has decreased DRASTICALLY. thank you!!
These are very comfortable

These shoes are so comfortable and durable! Quality materials for a great price and they clean up really well, you won’t regret buying them. Im normally a 9 1/2 but since they’re wide a 9 fits perfectly. Pairing these with splay socks everyday have my feet feeling stronger and pain free. I plan on buying several more pairs!
They didn’t fit me well. I didn’t like how wide they were. Like extra it seemed
Love that my toes have space. I've been having a lot of foot issues and they've gone away using these shoes . Plus they go with every outfit

I am new to the barefoot show thing but have been wearing a pair(another brand/style) to work out in for a month. I threw caution to the wind and bought this pair for our trip to Disney to all 4 parks. I am honestly blown away. I usually get low back pain and eventually knee pain when I stand / walk for too long. I had zero of each. My feet were tired at the end of each day but they didn’t hurt. We were at the parks from opening until almost closing, 12 hrs or more. Also, I have flat feet and always thought(I was told) I needed a supportive show to correct my flat feet. Turns out I don’t ! I am a barefoot believer! And you can’t beat the price of these!

I am pleased with the quality and comfort of this shoe! It's a good barefoot-style zero drop option. I like that both the color of the sole and the upper are black. I can use it with jeans or with a dressier pant for comfort at work. Thanks, Whitin, for a great shoe.
Amazing shoes! True to size and no breaking in necessary!
This is my first pair and i love them! They have a soft cushion inside by the ankle which is a definite plus!
Everything seems to be just as advertised. So , so far so good!  Room for my toes feels better.
For training is the best thing to maintain right posture
I ordered the wrong size the first time, and was refunded my money very quickly. Ordered the right size and they are very comfy
Very comfortable. Have already bought two other pair.

These are my favorite pair of workout shoes. They don’t have much support as they are more of a barefoot shoe. Good quality and lightweight. I appreciate the Large toe box, So my feet aren’t constructed.

I'm definitely buying another pair! These immediately solved my pain in my feet. They look good too. I was alittle worried they might look like clown shoes but they don't and my toes have so much room. Love these!

Size 7 wide; usually wear a 7.5 in most brands  I bought these in Nov ‘23 and am writing this review in Sep ‘24. These shoes have been my daily wearers for over 10months and I could not be happier. Though the sole has started to crack I cannot wait to get my next pair. Barefoot shoes definitely take some getting used to but once your feet have built up their muscles you’ll never go back. I used to suffer from sever ankle pain due to various basketball injuries and after switching to these shoes not only did my ankle strengthen I no longer had chronic pain. These shoes have trekked countless miles taking trips to Puerto Rico and Alaska, could not ask for a better companion. For the price I did not expect to get a year’s worth of wear but got real fricken close. I’ve definitely abused these so a more casual wearer may get more life out of these than I have.

评论概述: Love the fit and easy on off
评论详情: The first thing I’d like to say about these shoes is how easy they are to get on and off. No need to untie, the elasticity of the shoe helps you slide it on easily by pulling the back tab. And I love the spaciousness in the toes. That’s my favorite part! When I walk my feet tend to swell and this gives them plenty of space for expansion. They look a little wide, but I don’t care how they look, it’s about how they feel. I love these shoes and would happily buy them again! And the price is right! True to size
These shoes were exactly as pictured. Im a physical therapist and im on my feet alot and my feet couldnt be more comfortable. 10/10 recommend.

I have left a earlier rating. Love almost everything about these shoes but unfortunately the soles do not last. I get two holes on each shoe in a hurry. I am in my fourth pair. They are fine if they are only used for work and some walking. I take 1 1/4 mile extremely brisk walk with my dogs every night and after only 3-4 trips some parts of the sole are already visibly worn. I would not mind paying more for these shoes if the soles were made with a better material.

Bought for a long walk trip but seemed comfortable when I wear them . Got wide to ensure comfort since I tend to get the wide shoes , but seem a little “clown shoe look” At the front . My family said wouldn’t see it till I mentioned to them 😁 But what matters more to me more is the comfort 😂
